description: This Java class handles successful OAuth2 authentication events in a Spring Security context. It creates or updates user records in the database and generates JWT tokens for authenticated users, then redirects the user with the token.

classes.name: OAuth2AuthenticationSuccessHandler
classes.description: Handler for successful OAuth2 authentication that manages user data and JWT token creation.

methods.name: onAuthenticationSuccess
methods.description: Main method invoked upon successful OAuth2 login; it manages user record creation/update and JWT token generation, then redirects.
